pageContext.claim: “I believe they really want to make a deal. I think after 19 -- actually going very close to 20 years, they're also tired of fighting, believe it or not.”
pageContext.analysis: According to U.S. and Afghan officials, attacks were down significantly across the country, by as much as 80 percent, during the reduction of violence period. But the Taliban has still continued to execute sporadic attacks across the country throughout the peace negotiation process.
